account-exists_alert.heading: Account already exists
account-exists_alert.text: You have already added this specific account. Please change its derivation path to add another address (advanced mode).

ask-permission.heading: AirGap is not persistent, secrets generated will not be stored and need to be imported again after a restart
ask-permission.text: This distribution is intended to securely generate secrets as well as to sign transactions offline, but not for secret storage.

no-vm.heading: AirGap Vault Distribution should not be run on a virtual machine, if the host has network connectivity even if the connectivity has been turned off temporarily.
no-vm.text: Make sure that the client is disconnected from any network before you generate a new secret or import an existing one.

local-authentication-onboarding.heading: Your secret is accessed with your defined authentication method like fingerprint, face id or pin code.
local-authentication-onboarding.text: Your secret needs to be accessed for account creation and transaction signing.

secret-generate-onboarding.heading: AirGap is going to ask you for camera and microphone permissions, to allow a secure secret generation.
secret-generate-onboarding.text: Both permissions are used in order to generate a more secure secret for you.

introduction.title: O novo padr√£o de carteira de criptografia

highest.label: Maior seguran√ßa
highest.text: With the AirGap two device approach secure key handling becomes more accessible.

medium.label: Seguran√ßa M√©dia
medium.text: With the AirGap two app approach secure key handling becomes more accessible.

vault.heading: AirGap Vault
vault.text: A chave privada √© gerada e armazenada com seguran√ßa no aplicativo AirGap Vault. Voc√™ precisa instalar o AirGap Vault para usar o AirGap Wallet

wallet.heading: AirGap Wallet
wallet.text: O aplicativo de carteira lida apenas com informa√ß√µes p√∫blicas e √© respons√°vel por transmitir transa√ß√µes para o blockchain.

generate.label: Gerar
generate.text: Crie um novo segredo com nosso processo seguro para garantir que seus fundos estejam realmente seguros.

dice-roll.label: Generate with Dice Rolls
dice-roll.text: Use dice to generate a secure and verifiable recovery phrase.

coin-flip.label: Generate with Coin Flips
coin-flip.text: Use a coin to generate a secure and verifiable recovery phrase.

secret-edit.title: Your Secret
secret-edit.text: D√™ um nome ao seu segredo e selecione o n√≠vel de seguran√ßa.

security-level.heading: N√≠vel de seguran√ßa
security-level.text: Voc√™ pode criptografar seu segredo adicionalmente usando uma senha.

passcode.label: Senha de criptografia
passcode.text: Defina uma senha de criptografia para seu segredo. Esta √© uma configura√ß√£o opcional.

passphrase.label: BIP39 Passphrase
passphrase.text: The BIP39 passphrase has to be entered when creating an account.

secret-recovery.heading: Secret Recovery
secret-recovery.text: You can set up your secret recovery mechanisms after the initial setup.

social-recovery.label: Social Recovery
social-recovery.text:
Generate a number of secret shares
to distribute to social contacts.

interaction.label: Vault and Wallet interaction
interaction.text: Select whether Vault and Wallet are installed on the same device or on separate devices.

secret-recovery-key.label: Secret Recovery Key
secret-recovery-key.description: This recovery key guarantees the recovery of your secret from a corrupted secure storage. You will need the recovery key and your fingerprint, pin, pattern. Store it safely like your recovery phrase.
secret-recovery-key.generate-text: Gere uma chave de recupera√ß√£o para seu segredo
secret-recovery-key.reset-text: Redefinir a chave de recupera√ß√£o do seu segredo
secret-recovery-key.reset-error: N√£o foi poss√≠vel definir a chave de recupera√ß√£o

bip85.text: Securely generate a child mnemonic out of your master mnemonic.

show-mnemonic.label: Mostrar segredo
show-mnemonic.text: Exibir o segredo associado a este segredo.

alert.title: Exibir o segredo
alert.message: Lembre-se de que o segredo deve ser sempre mantido em sigilo, pois concede acesso total aos seus fundos. Sob nenhuma circunst√¢ncia tire uma captura de tela ou foto. Verifique se voc√™ est√° em um local seguro, onde ningu√©m mais possa ver sua tela.

show-mnemonic.reset-error: N√£o foi poss√≠vel definir a chave de recupera√ß√£o

alert.title: Duplicate Secret
alert.message: You have already added a secret with the same recovery phrase

secret-edit-delete-popover.title: Confirmar remo√ß√£o do segredo
secret-edit-delete-popover.text: Voc√™ realmente deseja remover esse segredo? Voc√™ n√£o poder√° restaur√°-lo sem um backup!

secret-generate.heading: Estamos gerando seu segredo.
secret-generate.text: Para isso, usamos sua acelera√ß√£o de v√≠deo, √°udio, toque e dispositivo para adicionar entropia adicional ao seu segredo.
secret-generate.description: Mova seu dispositivo para gravar √°udio, v√≠deo e acelera√ß√£o do dispositivo at√© que todos os escudos estejam cheios.

secret-import.title: Importar segredo
secret-import.text: Voc√™ pode importar um segredo existente para o AirGap. Preencha as palavras do seu segredo.
secret-import.warning: Verifique novamente a ortografia do seu segredo.

secret-rules.title: Read carefully
secret-rules.heading: Make sure you follow these rules
secret-rules.text: We've generated your secret, it's a sequence of words.
secret-rules.description: Make sure you understand these rules that ensure you will always have safe access to your accounts.

rules-list.item-1_text: Make sure you write these words down on a piece of paper.
rules-list.item-2_text: You have to strictly follow the sequence.
rules-list.item-3_text: Check the spelling of each word.
rules-list.item-4_text: Keep the piece of paper in a safe place.
rules-list.item-5_text: Under no circumstance take a screenshot or photo and do not photoscan it.
rules-list.item-6_text: Never upload your key anywhere to the cloud.

secret-show.title: This is your recovery phrase
secret-show.text: Write down each word on a piece of paper, remember to follow the rules.

too-fast_alert.title: That was fast!
too-fast_alert.heading: Are you sure you are not a super human?
too-fast_alert.text: Make sure that you followed all the rules and didn't do anything other than writing down your secret on paper.

secret-validate.title: Verify your recovery phrase
secret-validate.text: Match the order of your recovery phrase by selecting the correct words.

interaction-selection-settings.title: Wallet Interaction
interaction-selection-settings.heading: How would you like to interact with AirGap Wallet?

selector.same-device: Vault and Wallet on the same device

interaction-selection-settings.description: You can always change your preference in the Settings Tab

language-selection-settings.title: Sele√ß√£o de idioma
language-selection-settings.heading: Por favor, escolha o seu idioma preferido
language-selection-settings.description: Voc√™ sempre pode alterar sua prefer√™ncia nas configura√ß√µes

verify-key.incorrect_text:
Your secret does not match the generated one. Make sure you've chosen the correct words.
To correct mistakes, simply select a wrong word and choose the correct one.
verify-key.success_text: You have successfully verified this secret.

social-recovery-import.title: Social Recovery
social-recovery-import.text: In order to recover your secret from your shares, indicate with how many shares you wish to recover your secret. Keep in mind that you will only be able to successfully recover your secret if you have as many shares for recovery as you have defined in the set up of social recovery.

social-recovery-setup.title: Social Recovery
social-recovery-setup.text: With Social Recovery you can create secret shares and distribute them to social contacts you trust. You can recover a lost secret if you have a set number of these secret shares.

secret-shares.label: Secret Shares
secret-shares.text: You can define the amount of shares you wish to generate and the number of shares necessary for a successful recovery of your secret.

social-recovery-setup.shares-recovery_label: Number of shares needed for recovery

social-recovery-show-share.title: Social Recovery
social-recovery-show-share.text: Write down each word on a piece of paper, remember to follow all the rules.

social-recovery-validate-share.title: Social Recovery
social-recovery-validate-share.text: Tap each word to match the correct order:

tab-scan.title: QR Code Scanner
tab-scan.text: Scan a QR Code from AirGap Wallet
tab-scan.multi-qr_text: This transaction consists of multiple QR codes. Keep your camera on the changing QRs and wait until all codes are scanned.
tab-scan.empty-state_heading: In order to scan QR codes, AirGap Vault needs the camera permission.

tab-wallets.title: Accounts
tab-wallets.empty-state_text: Create a new account by selecting a currency and sync it to AirGap Wallet.

generate-recovery-key.title: Secret Recovery Key Backup
generate-recovery-key.description: To always ensure a recovery of your stored secret, a backup of the secret recovery key is needed.

incompatible-qr_alert.title: Incompatible QR
incompatible-qr_alert.text: This QR is not a raw transaction.

no-secret_alert.title: No account found
no-secret_alert.text: You do not have any compatible accounts for this public key in AirGap. Please import your secret and create the corresponding account to sign this transaction.

transaction.title: Sign Transaction
transaction.unreadable_warning: We were not able to extract information from this transaction. This does not mean that the transaction is invalid - Please make sure that you know what you are doing, and you can verify that you know that this transaction contains the correct data.

bip39-passphrase.message: If you have set a BIP-39 passphrase, please enter it here.

bip39-passphrase-error.message: Public keys do not match. Did you enter the correct BIP-39 Passphrase?

secret-not-found-error.message: No secret found for this public key

deserialized-detail.signing_account: You're signing with an account from {{secretLabel}}

transaction-signed.title: Signed Transaction
transaction-signed.heading: This is your signed transaction, scan it with AirGap Wallet.

copy-address_modal.text: Address was copied to your clipboard

wallet-not-migrated.message: Can't proceed, please update or re-add the account first.

interaction-selection.title: Wallet Interaction
interaction-selection.heading: How would you like to interact with AirGap Wallet?

wallet-edit-delete-popover.confirm_address_copy: Address was copied to your clipboard
wallet-edit-delete-popover.confirm_sync_code_copy: Sync code was copied to your clipboard

account-removal_alert.title: Confirm Account Removal
account-removal_alert.text: Do you want to remove this account? You can always add it back later if you know its correct derivation path!

wallet-share.title: Sync Account
wallet-share.heading: This is your Sync QR code, scan it with AirGap Wallet.
wallet-share.text: This QR includes your extended public key, public address and your type of coin. Do not share it publicly!

wallet-share-select.title: Sync Account
wallet-share-select.heading: Select the accounts you'd like to sync with AirGap Wallet.

wallets-not-migrated.message: Can't proceed, please update or re-add the accounts first.

excluded-legacy-accounts.message: Some of the selected accounts can't be synced and must be updated or re-added. You can still sync the rest of the accounts.

root.title: Your device is rooted
root.description: It seems like you have rooted your device. While we think this is neat, it weakens the security of your device significantly and multiple mechanisms of AirGap can be circumvented by other apps. Therefore, AirGap is not able to run on this device.

screenshot.title: Screenshot detected
screenshot.description: Looks like you just took a screenshot. Make sure that you never take a screenshot as you might expose your secret key.

secure-storage.title: Device Unsecure
secure-storage.description: Your lockscreen needs to be setup in order to properly encrypt and protect your secrets. After securing your device, please close and restart AirGap.

network.title: Network Connection detected
network.description: Looks like you have connected this device to a network. The AirGap App has no network priviledges but it is best to disconnect the device entierly from any network.

disclaimer.title: AirGap Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: You as the user hereby accept and acknowledge this protocol and all the information provided within to the fullest extent. You as the user confirm that the content this document has been reviewed, tested and understood on their own behalf.

disclaimer-list.text: To the fullest extent permitted by applicable law:
disclaimer-list.item-1_text: All services provided by Papers AG, its employees, freelancers or other subcontractors are provided without representation and warranty of any kind
disclaimer-list.item-2_text: Papers AG disclaims any and all direct and indirect liability for damage occurring under, or in connection with, this Protocol, especially, but not limited to loss of, or damage to, data, lost profit, compromised / hacked product or system, and or stolen / missing monetary funds.

disclaimer.description: You understand the risks involved in this software, including but no limited to losing your secret, thus private keys and access to your funds.

bip85-generate.title: Generate BIP85
bip85-generate.text: BIP85 allows you to securely derive a new mnemonic out of your main mnemonic. As long as you have access to your main mnemonic, you will always be able to re-generate your child mnemonics.

alert.message: You set a BIP39 Passphrase. You will need to enter this passphrase again when you try to derive the same child key!

bip85-show.title: Show BIP85 Details
bip85-show.text: Write down all the words on a piece of paper. You will have to verify the mnemonic on the next page.

message-signing-request.title: Signed Message
message-signing-request.payload_label: Message to sign. Make sure you know what you are signing.
message-signing-request.blake2b_hash: Ledger Blake2b hash of the message
message-signing-request.heading: This is your signed message, scan it with AirGap Wallet.

message-signing.title: Select Account
message-signing.heading: Please select an account to scan this message with

psbt.title: Select Account
psbt.heading: Please select an account to sign this PSBT with

link-page.scan-qr: Scan the QR code to open the link on an online device
link-page.link-clipboard_label: The link was copied to your clipboard

list.header:
The following secrets and accounts will be updated to support the new simplified onboarding.

Note: You may be asked to authenticate and provide a password, if it has been set for any of the displayed secrets or accounts.

paranoia-info.message: It looks like you have set an encryption password to additionally secure {{label}}. You may be be asked to provide it during the update. Skip if you don't want to update this secret now.

bip39-passphrase.message: If you have set a BIP-39 passphrase for {{address}} ({{protocol}}), please enter it here or skip the update of this account.

unknown-error.message: Something went wrong! Please try again.

danger-zone.label: Danger Zone
danger-zone.description: The actions on this page are only intended for advanced users. Please be aware of the consequences if you use one of the following features.

alert.title: Wipe Vault
alert.message:
This action will delete all your secrets and reset AirGap Vault to the factory settings.

Make sure you have a backup of all your recovery phrases.

alert.title: Error
alert.message: An error occured while trying to wipe the app. If this error persists, please uninstall and remove the app from your device.

secret-generate-dice-roll.title: Dice Rolls
secret-generate-dice-roll.label: Generate Secret with Dice Rolls
secret-generate-dice-roll.description: Generating entropy with dice rolls is an advanced feature. It allows you to provide your own entropy and generate a verifiable recovery phrase. Only use this feature if you know how to use it!
secret-generate-dice-roll.status: {{ inputLength }} of at least 99 rolls ({{ entropyBits }} bits of entropy)

type-alert.message: There are multiple standards of how dice roll inputs can be interpreted. Select one of the types below if you want to verify your mnemonic with another tool.

secret-generate-coin-flip.title: Coin Flips
secret-generate-coin-flip.label: Generate Secret with Coin Flips
secret-generate-coin-flip.description: Generating entropy with coin flips is an advanced feature. It allows you to provide your own entropy and generate a verifiable recovery phrase. Only use this feature if you know how to use it!
secret-generate-coin-flip.status: {{ inputLength }} of 256 coin flips ({{ inputLength }} bits of entropy)
secret-generate-coin-flip.head: Head
